commits.message: think we don't need this anymore, seems to work as expected without
git branch completion, open diffs with GdiffFiles
fix <M-3> as no longer using UK keyboard
nvim-treesitter-textobjects parameters and swap instead of Sideways
don't confuse autocmds with other scripts

issue.title: `substitute()` in lua doesn't pass matching strings argument to callback
issue.body:
### Neovim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.8.0-dev-1093-g982fef601-dirty

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

macOS 12.3.1

### Terminal name/version

kitty 0.25.2

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty

### Installation

homebrew install neovim --HEAD

### How to reproduce the issue

nvim --clean
:lua print(vim.fn.substitute('a b c', 'b', function(m) print(vim.inspect(m)); return m[1] end, 'g'))


### Expected behavior

Expected `m` to be the array `{ 'b' }`, or otherwise the matched string with any other submatches as additional entries, as per documentation for `substitute()`.

That is:

```lua
print(vim.fn.substitute('a b c', 'b', function(m) print(vim.inspect(m)); return m[1] end, 'g'))
```

I would have expected

```
{ 'b' }
a b c
```


### Actual behavior

Actual behaviour is that the first argument to the lua function (`m` in this case) is _always_ an empty table `{}`. This is true even if there are matching groups in the regex. The lua expression:

```lua
print(vim.fn.substitute('a b c', 'b', function(m) print(vim.inspect(m)); return m[1] end, 'g'))
```

Will output:

```
{}
a v:null c
```

The behaviour in equivalent VimScript is as expected:

```viml
echo substitute('a b c', 'b', { m -> '(' . m[0] . ')' }, 'g')
```

Will output `a (b) c`.

commits.message: better ansi coloring on kitty output
allow terminals to be placed full screen in new tab
disable matchup and surround insert mappings for <C-G>, it messes with Telescope file_browser <C-G>
use Telescope file_browser instead of fern
think we don't need this anymore, seems to work as expected without
git branch completion, open diffs with GdiffFiles
fix <M-3> as no longer using UK keyboard
nvim-treesitter-textobjects parameters and swap instead of Sideways
don't confuse autocmds with other scripts
